name: Cards and Towers
description:
This is a tower defence game + a card game I made in a week. The purpose of this game is to just try out an idea and also for me to get my hands into the 3D world of making games since all my previous games were either 2D or 3D but freelance games or a  game that I just gave up on.  So this is a full-blown,  jam-like,  game made in a week with a whooping  1 level! Enjoy!

You can find this games source code over here: https://github.com/ClumsyWizard-NabilShelim/Codename-CTD (Procced with caution 😨)

Controls
  • WASD to move the camera
  • Left-click and drag on a card onto the battlefield, release to drop the structure
